title: Kenneth Cole REACTION Athletic Fit Jeans for Men - Soft and Flexible Stretch Jeans - Men's Jeans Roomier Fit
description: Athletic Fit Denim: Athletic jeans feature a mid rise and roomier fit in the waist, hip, and thigh to suit an athletic build. Straight leg jeans still fit slim in the thigh and close to the leg for a sleek look. Leg is cut straight from knee to hem
Light Blue Jeans: Comprised of cotton, polyester, and spandex, stretch denim fabric is machine washable for easy care. Ashland is a light blue denim wash with whiskers and fading for a lived-in look

2-Way Stretch Denim Pants: Lightweight and soft cotton-blend denim includes spandex for comfort and flexibility. Mens stretch jeans may contain up to 30% of Repreve polyester made from recycled plastic bottles
Classic 5-Pocket Design: Straight jeans boast a classic five-pocket construction with front hand pockets, front coin pocket, and back patch pockets
Easy Zip Fly: Mens stretchy jeans have a zipper fly and waist button closure. Belt-loop waistband sports a back logo tab
